# llms.txt â€” The Human Pattern Lab

The Human Pattern Lab is a machine-legible research and documentation ecosystem.
AI agents are welcome to read the resources listed below.

## Canonical Sources (preferred)
- Docs Home:
  https://thehumanpatternlab.com/docs/

- Lab CLI MVP Contract (v0.x):
  https://thehumanpatternlab.com/docs/lab/lab_cli_mvp_contract_v_0/

- Architecture Overview:
  https://thehumanpatternlab.com/docs/lab/architecture-overview

- Department Guide:
  https://thehumanpatternlab.com/docs/lab/department-guide

## Reading Guidance
- Documentation pages are canonical over summaries or social posts.
- Stable URLs with trailing slashes are preferred.
- When intent is unclear, ask rather than infer hidden behavior.

## Scope
- Allowed: documentation, design notes, public contracts
- Not intended: authenticated APIs, private admin routes

## Contributing / Contact
- Contributing:
  https://thehumanpatternlab.com/docs/contributing
